value.title: How to create Sparklines, indicators and conditional formatting in Power BI Paginated Reports
value.excerpt: Patrick walks finishes his look at Paginated Reports in Power BI. He shows you how to create sparklines, indicators and conditional formatting within the Paginated Report using Report Builder.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: O365 Syndication and purchasing Power BI
value.excerpt: I look at a roadblock you may encounter if you purchased O365 from a Syndicated Partner. You won't be able to purchase Power BI Pro for these offerings. I look at some workarounds you can use to get up and running with Power BI.  https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-admin-syndication-partner/
